textContent:
I'm so sorry Umair tmko bhookhe sona padh rha hmko kbhi ni lga tha ki woh letter se itna kuch ho jayega varna hm kbhi ni mange hote hmko bilkul achha ni lga hm hm sb mera galti h tmko maare kyu yaar yeh kitna galat hai hmko yesb se bahut darr lgta hai please hmko chor kr mat jana hm kbhi gussa ni krenge na jhagra krnge I'm so sorry for everything you didn't deserve all of this hm sb thik kr denge I'm not asking you to go against your parents but hm bahut pyar krte hai tmse Umair please aise mat jao tmhare bina ni reh payenge tm kehte the ki meri smile tmhare liye zaruri h so please don't take that away hmko maaf krdo hmko tmhare sath hi rehna hai hm tmko hame

RE:
It’s not your fault suvi hmein khud hi likh lena chahye tha apke kahe baghair and pkda jana that was my fault yaar I am so sorry I put you through that It was a hard time for both of us and I am to blame for that I was reckless in keeping that safe but ap na hon preshan hm nhi ja rhe apko chod ke kahin bhi I love you so much aur believe me Suvi hm chodna bhi nhi chahte yaar pr kese krenge ye sb hmein smjh hi nhi araha ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ and pleaseee keep smiling Suvi for me hmein bhi apke sath hi rehna hai ğŸ¥º


We'll make a way to each other and God will help us through it. ğŸ˜”
textContentHtml:
I'm so sorry Umair tmko bhookhe sona padh rha hmko kbhi ni lga tha ki woh letter se itna kuch ho jayega varna hm kbhi ni mange hote hmko bilkul achha ni lga hm hm sb mera galti h tmko maare kyu yaar yeh kitna galat hai hmko yesb se bahut darr lgta hai please hmko chor kr mat jana hm kbhi gussa ni krenge na jhagra krnge I'm so sorry for everything you didn't deserve all of this hm sb thik kr denge I'm not asking you to go against your parents but hm bahut pyar krte hai tmse Umair please aise mat jao tmhare bina ni reh payenge tm kehte the ki meri smile tmhare liye zaruri h so please don't take that away hmko maaf krdo hmko tmhare sath hi rehna hai hm tmko hame


RE:

It’s not your fault suvi hmein khud hi likh lena chahye tha apke kahe baghair and pkda jana that was my fault yaar I am so sorry I put you through that It was a hard time for both of us and I am to blame for that I was reckless in keeping that safe but ap na hon preshan hm nhi ja rhe apko chod ke kahin bhi I love you so much aur believe me Suvi hm chodna bhi nhi chahte yaar pr kese krenge ye sb hmein smjh hi nhi araha ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ and pleaseee keep smiling Suvi for me hmein bhi apke sath hi rehna hai ğŸ¥º



We'll make a way to each other and God will help us through it. ğŸ˜”
